Conspectus Scroll.name: Conspectus Scroll
Conspectus Scroll.summary: Give to a learned sorcerer to acquire new sorceries
description: A sorcery scroll from the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Details superior sorceries taught to scholars worthy of donning the stone crown and studying a certain conspectus.
Can be given to a learned sorcerer to gain access to the following sorceries:
- Glintstone Cometshard
- Star Shower

Royal House Scroll.name: Royal House Scroll
Royal House Scroll.summary: Give to a learned sorcerer to acquire new sorceries
description: Sorcery scroll of the Carian royal family, the heads of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
Can be given to a learned sorcerer to gain access to the following sorceries:
- Glintblade Phalanx
- Carian Slicer

Fire Monks' Prayerbook.name: Fire Monks' Prayerbook
Fire Monks' Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook of the Fire Monks, who came from the Mountaintops of the Giants far to the north.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- O, Flame!
- Surge, O Flame!

Giant's Prayerbook.name: Giant's Prayerbook
Giant's Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook that contains the secrets of the Fire Giants.
Kept hidden by the prelates who monitor the Giant's Flame.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Giantsflame Take Thee
- Flame, Fall Upon Them

Godskin Prayerbook.name: Godskin Prayerbook
Godskin Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook bound in supple skin.
Incantations of the god-slaying black flame are written within.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Black Flame
- Black Flame Blade

Two Fingers' Prayerbook.name: Two Fingers' Prayerbook
Two Fingers' Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook containing incantations of the Two Fingers.
An item once entrusted to Tarnished worthy of lordship.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Lord's Heal
- Lord's Aid

Assassin's Prayerbook.name: Assassin's Prayerbook
Assassin's Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook of the Roundtable Hold's assassins.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Assassin's Approach
- Darkness

Golden Order Principia.name: Golden Order Principia
Golden Order Principia.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
A dense and complex academic treatise that contains the Order's fundamental principles.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Radagon's Rings of Light
- Law of Regression

Dragon Cult Prayerbook.name: Dragon Cult Prayerbook
Dragon Cult Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
A text of the knights' faith that arose after the War of the Ancient Dragons.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Lightning Spear
- Honed Bolt
- Electrify Armament

Ancient Dragon Prayerbook.name: Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
Ancient Dragon Prayerbook.summary: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations
description: Prayerbook of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
A lost tome that never reached the Lands Between.
Contains red lightning incantations.
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
- Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike

Academy Scroll.name: Academy Scroll
Academy Scroll.summary: Give to a learned sorcerer to acquire new sorceries
description: Scroll of the Academy of Raya Lucaria, the glintstone sorcerers' place of study.
Can be given to a learned sorcerer to gain access to the following sorceries:
- Great Glintstone Shard
- Swift Glintstone Shard

Pidia's Bell Bearing.summary: Offer to Twin Maiden Husks for new item access
description: Servant Pidia's bell bearing, found upon his perished flesh.
Offer to the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold to gain access to new items.

Contains knowledge of dealing with rot; the application of fire in particular.
Acquire the knowledge to craft the following:
- Exalted Flesh
